channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s the Last Day of the All-Clad Factory Seconds Sale
item.description: All-Clad cookware is the best you can buy—and it has a price tag to match. This sale will stretch your dollars.

item.title: Nurture wants to teach kids important life skills through interactive gameplay and entertainment
item.description: Parents understand the challenge of keeping young kids engaged in online learning. Nurture is a new app designed for children aged 4 to 7 that feature...

item.title: Josh Johnson Has Become the Funniest Guy on the Internet. That Is Not a Joke
item.description: The Daily Show correspondent and TikTok phenom once said the web was a bad idea. Now it’s the reason he’s famous.

item.title: Google nets court win against EU’s $1.7B AdSense antitrust decision
item.description: Google has succeeded in overturning a $1.7 billion antitrust penalty handed down by the European Union back in March 2019. © 2024 TechCrunch. All righ...

item.title: RSV Can Be a Killer. New Tools Are Identifying the Most At-Risk Kids
item.description: RSV infects almost every child before they turn 2, and kills more than 100,000 infants worldwide each year. Machine learning and statistical models ar...

item.title: 23andMe sees independent board directors quit en masse
item.description: 23andMe, the personal genomics company, went public in early 2021 via a merger with a blank check company that valued it at $3.5 billion. Then its for...

item.title: Most US Teens Use Generative AI. Most of Their Parents Don't Know
item.description: A news survey shows that AI use among high schoolers has exploded in recent months, as educators and parents struggle to keep up.

item.title: Governor Newsom on California AI bill SB 1047: ‘I can’t solve for everything’
item.description: California Governor Gavin Newsom said there are 38 bills on his desk that would create laws around artificial intelligence on Tuesday, but one looms l...

item.title: Did a Chinese University Hacking Competition Target a Real Victim?
item.description: Participants in a hacking competition with ties to China’s military were, unusually, required to keep their activities secret, but security researcher...

item.title: Amazon taps long-time exec to lead India business as competition intensifies
item.description: Amazon has named long-time executive Samir Kumar as the new head of its India consumer business, a month after its domestic business' head resigned. ©...
